main event: One object with a peculiar color the size of a basketball passed the observer while traveling very fast on February 25, 1957.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for only 2 to 3 seconds.,The object was observed in Ely, Nevada.,The object was described as having a peculiar color.,The observer noted that the object was traveling very fast.,There were no additional reports or conclusions in the file.
sighted object: one object the size of a basketball
